tool_description: search Get products from all e-com sites with image, name, and price. ratings and url
name: compare
title: compare

api_list.name: get site that have product
api_list.description: This end point return the sites that have specific product in it
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://compare3.p.rapidapi.com/sites/power bank"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "compare3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://compare3.p.rapidapi.com/sites/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "compare3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get products
api_list.description: this endpoint return the product related to the search
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://compare3.p.rapidapi.com/search/power bank"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "compare3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
